text: læa phraxngkh nan khux phu thi thrng hı phwk cea pen phu sub thæn nı phændin læa di thrng theid bang khn khxng phwk cea henux kwa xik bang khn hlay khan pheux thi phraxngkh ca thrng thdsxb phwk cea nı sing thi phraxngkh di thrng prathan kæ phwk cea thæcring phracea khxng cea nan pen phu rwdrew nı kar lngthosʹ læa thæcring phraxngkh nan pen phuthrng xphaythosʹ phuthrng xendu metta
